item.description:
Camp Rising Sun is a camp for children who have been diagnosed with cancer," says the group's web site. "Children ages 6 - 18 attend camp free of charge. Camp is staffed by volunteer counselors who give a week of their time, love and energy. We have a pediatric oncologist and three nurses on campus 24-hours a day to tend to medical needs."

Camp Rising Sun takes place at Camp Jewell YMCA in Colebrook. In order to keep this camp free for the kids the group holds an annual fundraiser, which this year will be held on Wednesday, July 25th at the Owenego Inn in Branford.


JOIN ME IN ATTENDING! OWENEGO IS A GREAT VENUE, ON THE WATER IN BRANFORD!

What: The 7th Annual Night Out
When: Wednesday, July 23rd
Time: 6:00-10:00pm
Where: Owenego Inn
40 Linden Ave, Branford, CT
More Info: Dinner*Cash Bar*Silent Auction
Raffle*Kids Activities
Live music featuring: Mean Carlene
Vivid
Tickets: Adults - $25
Kids - $10


Their goal this year is to raise $150,000.
item.name: Camp Rising Sun Fundraiser at Owenego!
